text: انطلقوا۟ الى ظل ذى ثلث شعب

translations.translation: Proceed to a shadow which forks into three
Go to the shadow with three ramifications,
proceed towards the three-pronged shadow,
Proceed to that shadow, rising in three columns
“Move towards the shadow of the smoke having three branches.”
Depart you to a shadow in three columns,"
Walk on to the covering having three branches,
Depart to a triple-massing shadow
Depart unto the shadow falling threefold,
Proceed to a shadow rising in three columns:
Depart Unto the shadow three branched:
Proceed toward the triple-forked shadow,
Depart ye to a Shadow (of smoke ascending) in three columns,
Depart you to a shadow (of Hell-fire smoke ascending) in three columns,
Depart into the shadow of three masses,
“Proceed to a shadow of three different masses.”
Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns
[77:30] Depart to a triple-forked shadow — this is the smoke of Hell, which, as it rises, splits into three parts because of its magnitude —
The angels who are the keepers of the Fire will say to them after the end of reckoning: (Depart) deniers (unto the shadow) caused by the smoke of the Fire (falling threefold) three groups.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { ٱنطَلِقُوۤاْ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلاَثِ شُعَبٍ } معناه إلى دُخانِ جَهنمَ

translations.translation: And His saying, { Depart to a shadow having three branches } means go to the smoke of Hell.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثمَّ قبل لهم تأكيداً وتشديداً على توبيخهم وتقريعهم: { ٱنطَلِقُوۤاْ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ } وأيّ ظل، ظل { ذِي ثَلاَثِ شُعَبٍ } [المرسلات: 30] متشعبة من القوى البهيمية الوهمية الشهوية، والغضبية؛ إذ بها تقترف المعاصي، وتُكسب جميع الآثام الموجبة لدخول النار
